description.text:
Horizon’s diagnostics division is a leading provider of genetically defined, human genomic reference standards, including FFPE sections and genomic DNA. These standards represent a sustainable source of oncology-focused reference material to laboratories, proficiency testing schemes and manufacturers; providing an unprecedented level of control.
Our vision is to drive the standardization of molecular diagnostic tests across India, leading to improved sensitivity, specificity and reliability of patient diagnoses.
description.html:
Horizon’s diagnostics division is a leading provider of genetically defined, human genomic reference standards, including FFPE sections and genomic DNA. These standards represent a sustainable source of oncology-focused reference material to laboratories, proficiency testing schemes and manufacturers; providing an unprecedented level of control.

Our vision is to drive the standardization of molecular diagnostic tests across India, leading to improved sensitivity, specificity and reliability of patient diagnoses.

description.text:
Proficiency Testing and Routine Validation of Molecular Diagnostics 
In collaboration with the EMQN, Horizon invites you to attend our symposium, focusing on the improving pathology practices. Learn more about the real operational, economic and healthcare benefits to be realized in your laboratory and the importance of proficiency testing and use of reference standards as independent external controls. 
Our aims: 

Encourage discussion in a relaxed atmosphere
Inspire new collaborations between Indian laboratories

  
There will be a number of talks including the following: 

Dr Simon Patton, Director, EMQN: “ The importance of regular proficiency testing”
Dr Jonathan Frampton, Associate Director Products, Horizon: “Routine Validation of Molecular Diagnostic Tests covering Sanger, qPCR, NGS, FISH and IHC”
A local representative to the Hyderabad area
A national Indian representative 

  
Present a Poster: Interested in presenting a poster? Email j.whittaker@horizondiscovery.com 
Lunch is included at the start of the symposium and provision made for debate at the end to stimulate further discussions. 
Registration for the event is free and we invite attendees to submit a topic of interest to present at the meeting (15 minute talks). Depending on the volume of talks, we may have to adapt the agenda accordingly. 
Registration 

Participation is free, but registration is required
Space is limited, so please book early to avoid disappointment
Registration Deadline 1 October 2015

  
For further information on the venue click here
description.html:
Proficiency Testing and Routine Validation of Molecular Diagnostics

In collaboration with the EMQN, Horizon invites you to attend our symposium, focusing on the improving pathology practices. Learn more about the real operational, economic and healthcare benefits to be realized in your laboratory and the importance of proficiency testing and use of reference standards as independent external controls.

Our aims:

  • Encourage discussion in a relaxed atmosphere
  • Inspire new collaborations between Indian laboratories

 

There will be a number of talks including the following:

  • Dr Simon Patton, Director, EMQN: “ The importance of regular proficiency testing”
  • Dr Jonathan Frampton, Associate Director Products, Horizon: “Routine Validation of Molecular Diagnostic Tests covering Sanger, qPCR, NGS, FISH and IHC”
  • A local representative to the Hyderabad area
  • A national Indian representative 


Present a Poster: Interested in presenting a poster? Email j.whittaker@horizondiscovery.com

Lunch is included at the start of the symposium and provision made for debate at the end to stimulate further discussions.

Registration for the event is free and we invite attendees to submit a topic of interest to present at the meeting (15 minute talks). Depending on the volume of talks, we may have to adapt the agenda accordingly.

Registration

  • Participation is free, but registration is required
  • Space is limited, so please book early to avoid disappointment
  • Registration Deadline 1 October 2015

 

For further information on the venue click here

long_description.text:
The QS World MBA Tour is the most prestigious MBA fair in the world and is perfect for anybody looking to begin studying an MBA.
Each MBA fair gives candidates the chance to meet the best business schools from around the world.
We also have a QS World Executive MBA Tour, which is specifically for people considering an EMBA.
The fairs are FREE to attend if you register your place prior to the fair.
Please click here for more information and full details of each event.
long_description.html:
The QS World MBA Tour is the most prestigious MBA fair in the world and is perfect for anybody looking to begin studying an MBA.

Each MBA fair gives candidates the chance to meet the best business schools from around the world.

We also have a QS World Executive MBA Tour, which is specifically for people considering an EMBA.

The fairs are FREE to attend if you register your place prior to the fair.

Please click here for more information and full details of each event.

description.text: The QS World MBA Tour is designed to be a comprehensive day that can give you the competitive advantage to make your application a success.  Discover your perfect MBA program by speaking with admissions advisers from top international business schools, attend interactive info-sessions, learn how to ace the GMAT at our preparation workshop, network with Alumni from Top Business Schools and much more..  By attending, you will be eligible for US$1.7 Million exclusive scholarships to help fund your MBA and also be able to get exclusive loans from Credila.    Also, arrive early to get complimentary copy of the QS Top MBA Career Guide – World’s largest read Bi-Annual MBA Publication. (The first 200 attendees on the day)  Register in advance to reserve your place now at http://bit.ly/1KkYpeY

long_description.text:
Thinking of applying for a Masters or PhD?
Come and meet the QS World Grad School Tour in a city near you.
With over 350 of the world’s top graduate schools touring with us across 40 countries, the QS World Grad School Tour is the ideal place to get all your questions answered.
Attend seminars covering admissions, financial aid, student housing and careers. Listen in to alumni panels and learn from the experiences of recent graduates. We also offer one-to-one meetings with universities if you meet certain criteria. Exclusive US$1.2 million worth of QS Scholarships is also available, come along to find out more.
The fairs are FREE to attend if you register your place prior to the fair.
Click here for more information and to see the cities we are travelling.

description.text:
Find your ideal Master's Program at the QS World Grad School Tour in Hyderabad! 
Register for FREE at http://bit.ly/1iV00iF  Discover information about studying in different countries and which university is best suited to meet your career aspirations at the QS World Grad School Tour in Hyderabad on 10th December.   Main features of the Fair: • Meet face to face with admission directors from top universities • US $ 1.7 million exclusive scholarships available • Attend study abroad seminars • Test preparation advice • Attend pre-fair admissions panels • Exclusive lower rate loans from Credila for attendees • Free USB of the QS Top Grad School Guide - For the first 200 candidates 
 We look forward to seeing you there!!

• Meet face to face with admission directors from top universities
• US $ 1.7 million exclusive scholarships available
• Attend study abroad seminars
• Test preparation advice
• Attend pre-fair admissions panels

We look forward to seeing you there!!

Solidworks 2016 is ready for you... Attend Solidworks 2016 Innovation Day to know what's New in Solidworks 2016 how it is going to improve your productivity. Register free today..Limited seats are available..!! 
REGISTER TODAY 
At SOLIDWORKS 2016 launch event, you can: 

Engage with experts to see how SOLIDWORKS tools empower innovation
Get skilled on the advanced tools and improved graphical interface
Look under the hood at automated features that enable you to focus on design,not CAD
Gain insight into the industry-specific tools that address your unique needs
Swap tips & tricks with peers from your local SOLIDWORKS Community

 
Note: This event is exclusively for working professionals, Students are strictly not allowed.

description.text:
Aspira Training is part of the Aspira Executive PA search consultancy based in London. 
Aspira Training is dedicated to providing training for personal assistants and support staff within the financial and investment sector. Our aim is to equip our delegates with the necessary knowledge and skills to become indespensible business assets within their organisation. 
We provide a range of courses tailored to each deleagte's needs to ensure that they leave with the ability to excel in their current role and deliver exceptional results. We work with industry experienced trainers, who deliver comprehensive and up-to-date courses relevant to current market trends.

description.text:
Office Management Online Training  
Duration: 60 Hours 
Location:Online Learning 
* Please note that this is only an approximate figure and is dependent upon how much time you can dedicate to your studies and also how well you grasp the learning concepts in the course material. Furthermore, at the end of each module there is a question paper which needs to be completed and returned to your personal tutor. You have access to the course for 6 months.  This can be extended upon request. 
OBJECTIVE 
Like it or not, every manager has to organise his or her work place. It may involve organising one department or the entire business. We organise to develop good work habits. 
When organising we take a realistic look at the future, then try to accurately forecast problems, determine alternative strategies to these problems and then finally evaluate available resources. 
This course will help you to understand the functions and procedures of the office within any business. 
COURSE MODULES 
This course is designed to equip professionals with the skills necessary to successfully communicate with personal authority, truly engage others and have a positive lasting impact, whether with their boss or anyone else in their team, to a first class standard. 
  
Introduction to Office Procedures 
Ø  Summarise Shorthand, Dictation and Audio Recording, comparing the pros and cons of each 
Ø  Examine the various working areas discussed in this unit 
Communication Systems 
Ø  List the types of communication systems that are in use today 
Writing Letters and Reports 
Ø  Examine the elements involved when compiling a letter 
Computers 
Ø  Summarise how computers are beneficial to business world 
Office Materials and Equipment 
Ø  Define the filing process 
Office Organisations and Procedures 
Ø  Examine the steps to be considered when organising the workplace

description.text:
We are launching the India - UK Tech Week with an inaugural event in Hyderabad. The India - UK Tech Week from 12 to 16 October 2015  will cover 5 cities - Hyderabad, Mumbai, Bengaluru, Delhi and Thiruvananthapuram (Trivandrum). The launch event in Hyderabad will have presentations from the experts followed by a reception. 
Hyderabad is known for its history and cultural heritage is the now shared capital of India’s newest state of Telangana and the residual state of Andhra Pradesh. 
ICT is an important sector in this region with most of the global big names such as Microsoft, Facebook, Google, HSBC and many more operating from this region. Hyderabad is a fantastic destination and is one of the known destinations in the global ICT community.   
If you would like to attend, please contact Joseph John. 

Follow us on: Twitter, Facebook, Storify, Foursquare, Instagram, Blogs, Flickr, LinkedIn, Snapchat (username:UKinIndia), Periscope @UKinIndia, Vine@UKinIndia

The launch event in Hyderabad will have presentations from the experts followed by a reception.

Hyderabad is known for its history and cultural heritage is the now shared capital of India’s newest state of Telangana and the residual state of Andhra Pradesh.

long_description.text: American University of Antigua (AUA) College of Medicine was founded in 2004 and, since then, has accomplished more than some schools have in decades. By staying true to our mission statement and fostering a diverse academic community, AUA has built a medical school that will last for decades to come.
long_description.html: American University of Antigua (AUA) College of Medicine was founded in 2004 and, since then, has accomplished more than some schools have in decades. By staying true to our mission statement and fostering a diverse academic community, AUA has built a medical school that will last for decades to come.

description.text:
Register now for American University of Antigua (AUA) College of Medicine’s Information Seminar.  Attendees will learn about AUA’s clinically integrated curriculum, admissions requirements, and graduate success. The Info Seminar panel will include AUA admissions staff, who are happy to answer your questions. 
Reserve your spot today and discover why AUA is the best international medical school for you: 

AUA is a division of Manipal Global Education Services
AUA is recognized by the American Association of Physicians of Indian Origin (AAPI) as the leader in international medical education
Qualified graduates are eligible to take the Medical Council of India screening test
Scholarships are available for a limited number of Indian citizens and residents

description.text: Digital Marketing School is a Digital Marketing Consulting (DMC) India Initiative backed up strategically by Marketing to Minds group, a Swiss based Digital Marketing Company setup in 2008. The entire course is designed by professional digital marketing consultants with no less than 7 years of experience in Internet marketing, Search engine optimization, Search engine marketing and social media optimizatio
description.html: Digital Marketing School is a Digital Marketing Consulting (DMC) India Initiative backed up strategically by Marketing to Minds group, a Swiss based Digital Marketing Company setup in 2008. The entire course is designed by professional digital marketing consultants with no less than 7 years of experience in Internet marketing, Search engine optimization, Search engine marketing and social media optimizatio

description.text:
BECOME A CERTIFIED DIGITAL MARKETING PROFESSIONAL 
 
Executive Program In Digital Marketing 


EPDM course is taught by real-world experts and covers a range of critical topics, helping you to expand your expertise and get on the fast track to success. This course gives you understanding of how new technologies and opportunities can be integrated into our existing marketing plans and strategies. We promise you unique and advanced techniques with combinations of courses as per the requirement of individuals. 

WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT

Improving Your Organization's Performance 

Executive Program In Digital Marketing provides a fundamental analysis of how to think about your customers and industry differently, and a framework to help you design digital and social strategies. You will think through what is required to develop capabilities to support your strategy, including:

1.What are the unmet customer needs in the digital and social spheres?

2.How do I build products to meet these needs?

3.How do I integrate these products into my overall strategy?

4.What internal processes are required to facilitate these changes?

5.Taking Your Skills to the Next Level

6.Dynamic case studies, relevant classroom discussions and in-depth analyses will strengthen your ability to:

7.Understand the roles that digital and social should play in a sustainable business strategy

8.Rethink how your business engages with consumers
Uncover opportunities for connecting with new markets, industries, and countries

9.Assess the economic impact of various social and digital strategies.                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
PROGRAM STRUCTURE & DETAILS
 
This program provides a fundamental analysis of how to think about your customers and industry differently, and a framework to help you design digital and social strategies.

This program has been carefully designed to cover all the topics of Digital Marketing:

Foundation to Digital Marketing

Module 1: Website Planning
Module 2: Content Optimization
Module 3: Keyword Research
Module 4: Search Engine Optimization
Module 5: Social Media Marketing
Module 6: Google analytics
Module 7: Google Adwords
Module 8: Affiliate Marketing                                                                                                                              
Module 9: Display Marketing
Module 10: Google Adsense
Module 11: Email Marketing
Module 12: Mobile Marketing
and Digital Marketing Tools etc


 
 
INTERNSHIP:
You will get a chance to work on our own clients page for, 
Duration : 3 Weeks
Days : 5 Days a Week
Hours : 4 Hours a Day
 
IS THIS COURSE FOR YOU:

Executive Program In Digital Marketing is designed for business leaders who are charged with developing and implementing digital and social strategies at large established companies. 

Due to the collaborative nature of this program, individuals, career seekers and teams are encouraged to apply.


ADMISSIONS:

The Admissions are open . For further information & Pricing, reach us @ 9963548075 or Visit us at www.digitalmarketingschool.in 

About The Trainer: CT Shankar 
10+ years of experience in Digital marketing. Co-Founder ofwww.marketingtominds.com, A Global Digital marketing agency and Co-founded other 4 start-ups in India. Please visit www.CTShankar.com for more.. 

About The Trainer: Kalyan Mannuru
6+ years of experience in Digital marketing. Co-Founded interesting start-ups like www.mealoncall.in,www.brickandmotor.in,www.Digitalmarketingconsulting.in 

Are you ready to get trained with real entrepreneurs who practically apply Digital Marketing & Social media every day rather than just limit them self to class room training? 

Learn Agency level education only with Digital Marketing School (DMS)
